Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.states

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.ActionPhaseState
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.states.CharacterCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
InfluenceCard, MotherNatureCard, StudentMovementCard
public abstract class CharacterCard extends ActionPhaseState
Abstract Action Phase State, this class manages all common traits of character cards, like characterizations, price, activation ecc...
